question: Which state to host India’s first-ever trans art festival?
explanation: Kerala will host the India’s first-ever trans art festival titled \"Varnapakitt-2019\".  In it, talented transgender members will get a platform to showcase their artistic and creative skills. As part of the art festival, the state government has  also invited applications for cash awards from 10 transgenders who have proved their excellence in various social fields except cinema. The 2-day event is considered to be the first such state-sponsored art festival to be organized exclusively for transgenders in the country.
